channel.title: •Project Command Gen!•
channel.description:
Well guys and girls. I have desided to make a program which you can simply tell it what kind of command you want, items in it, teleports, and other stuff. The first will be for a 317 based server. You could simply add this program in your server files and have it ready for use. So, if you people are intrested please tell me. Oh, if you have any ideas please share them. *note to mod: If this thread is in the wrong place please move it.* Thanks!
I WILL KEEP YOU ALL UP TO DATE!
UPDATE 1: I have added, most of the part of the command maker. Just getting the command to come out in proper code will take a while. But it is getting there!
UPDATE 2: Got alot about all of the command gen in, finishd the GUI. Now, just need to finish the user inputs!
UPDATE 3: Added the add item command gen.
pic1: what it looks like when you open it. [IMG]http://i676.photobucket.com/albums/vv125/ckw100/pictureofproject1.jpg[/img]
pic2: addning the command input text ::123, hitting add item(all that is working atm.) [IMG]http://i676.photobucket.com/albums/vv125/ckw100/pictureofproject2.jpg[/img]
pic3: The Add item comamnd gen tool. [IMG]http://i676.photobucket.com/albums/vv125/ckw100/pictureofproject3.jpg[/img]
pic4: the code generated [IMG]http://i676.photobucket.com/albums/vv125/ckw100/pictureofproject4.jpg[/img]
UPDATE 4: Fixed the way the code was Generated, works better now, less bugs and fastter by alot.

item.title: •Project Command Gen!•
item.dc:creator: @xxckwxx xxckwxx
item.description:
@xxckwxx wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:23, topic:302364”]1. I don’t know any “experts” that would want/NEED to use this to make a command
2. After adding about, oh let’s just say 10 commands, all in one line, try seeing how easy it is to make changes to them later
3. Why would you make a command class for every command in your server, judging by the general mindset of members like you, you will more than likely have a command for every possible function in the server. pk1, pk2, gold, master, pure, strpure, barrows, dragon, bronze, rest of the metals, tele, noclip, getpass, promote, demote, etc. That’s well over 25 command classes that you have to make, where you could just as easily get a scripting engine, and dynamically change the commands at runtime.
4. Actually better yet, use a MySQL table for all commands, you could use either BLOBS, or just text and have the script engine interpret the text, or have the JVM load the BLOB into a virtual class and load it that way, but I’m sure you have no idea what that means.
5. It’s a V1. I understand that. But this is a HORRIBLE V1. I mean like i said earlier, AT LEAST USE SOME CODING CONVENTIONS[/quote]

THIS V1 IS NOT DONE IT IS HARDLY 1/4 DONE… also, for each command, it only has 1 file. Oh, my server only has Ban, ipban,j ail, unjail, bank, pickup, mute, ipmute, kick, teleto, teletome, yell and update. Now i do agree to

zyle1992:

There will never be such thing as a “perfect” base generator. There will ALWAYS be bugs and glitches. The day that bugs and glitches cease to exist is the day we stop being inspired to do something greater with what we have. Also, everyone’s perception of perfection varies, and even if you make a generator that makes one that starts with pking, or economy, or being able to do anything, there will be a multitude of people that will come along, use the base generator, and then alter to their likings. Thus the generator is not perfect because if it were, they wouldn’t have needed to edit anything.

Yes, there is no such thing as a “perfect” anything.

Read full topic

item.title: •Project Command Gen!•
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

  1. I don’t know any “experts” that would want/NEED to use this to make a command
  2. After adding about, oh let’s just say 10 commands, all in one line, try seeing how easy it is to make changes to them later
  3. Why would you make a command class for every command in your server, judging by the general mindset of members like you, you will more than likely have a command for every possible function in the server. pk1, pk2, gold, master, pure, strpure, barrows, dragon, bronze, rest of the metals, tele, noclip, getpass, promote, demote, etc. That’s well over 25 command classes that you have to make, where you could just as easily get a scripting engine, and dynamically change the commands at runtime.
  4. Actually better yet, use a MySQL table for all commands, you could use either BLOBS, or just text and have the script engine interpret the text, or have the JVM load the BLOB into a virtual class and load it that way, but I’m sure you have no idea what that means.
  5. It’s a V1. I understand that. But this is a HORRIBLE V1. I mean like i said earlier, AT LEAST USE SOME CODING CONVENTIONS

Read full topic

item.title: •Project Command Gen!•
item.dc:creator: @xxckwxx xxckwxx
item.description:
@xxckwxx wrote:

[quote=“TheKidXXX, post:21, topic:302364”]This is V1 and having a program that generates a few lines of code isn’t for “Noob/Leecher” use only but rather for experts too. It saves time from rewriting code or copy and pasting. Being V1 it it has to start somewhere!
xxxCkwxxx may add more advance features such as relocation Npc in the game already, rearranging shops easily and much more.[/quote]

Thanks, exactly…

Read full topic

item.description:

WEll clearly you know visual programming languages, I’m sure you learned java using Scratch. Besides what grand purpose does this have? Create an EXTREMELY limited number of commands? And not even using proper conventions? At LEAST follow the coding conventions.

item.title: •Project Command Gen!•
item.dc:creator: @xxckwxx xxckwxx
item.description:
@xxckwxx wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:17, topic:302364”]maker = synonym of generator, generator = synonym of maker

It’s the same damn thing. To make a command, and to generate a command are the exact same process, and exact same concept. And If you SERIOUSLY need a command generator to make an item, yell, or “other” then you should seriously learn more about Java, and wL servers before you continue.[/quote]

Lmao your saying this as if I don’t know Java…

Read full topic
